questions.question: What is the dominant visual texture displayed across the entire fabric sample?
Considering the visual appearance, what is the overall color of the fabric?
Based solely on visual inspection, what kind of material appears to be used?
Describe the visual impression of the fabric's surface; is it smooth or rough?
From the image, what is the apparent fiber direction or grain orientation?
Judging by the image, what is the primary visual pattern of the fabric?
Can you determine the level of sheen or glossiness of the fabric from the picture?
What is the general visual impression of the fabric's density or weight?
Does the fabric show any obvious irregularities or imperfections in the weave?
What is the perceived visual thickness of the fabric based on this image?

Does the image suggest any noticeable visual color variations in the fabric?
Describe the visual clarity of the fabric's structure and weave
Is there any visually apparent pattern repetition in the fabric's design?
